description:
This lavish brand-new home (under construction) located in the ever-growing Harpley estate of Werribee is an opportunity not to be missed! Compromising four generous sized bedrooms including master with walk in robe and ensuite, whilst the other three bedrooms are fitted with built in robes and all accommodated by the central bathroom. Kitchen features walk in pantry and soft close cabinetry. Turn key ready and quipped with luxury inclusions such as professionally styled interior colour themes, high ceilings, stone bench tops, quality floor coverings such as carpets and tiles. Additional appointments include landscaped front and backyard, fencing, driveway, letterbox, double car garage on remote and much more!

Situated in Arguably one of Werribee's most popular estates with everything at arm's reach! Located just 3km from Werribee CBD and 35km south west of Melbourne, Harpley is an easy escape from the city with direct access via the Princes Freeway. With easy access to transport, approx. 3.5km to Werribee Station, approx. 3k Wyndham Vale Station with buses running through Black Forrest Road. Only approximately 700m from the future town centre and future primary school.

Please contact the team at Barry Plant to discuss the procedure of purchasing.

• Sign intent to purchase form & pay $2,000 Holding Deposit to Porter Davis
• Balance of 5% deposit payable upon Contract Signing
• 95% due on completion at settlement (anticipated to be August/September 2022)

PHOTOS ARE FOR ILLUSTRATION PURPOSES ONLY.

listers.name: Reece Beckley
listers.job_title: Sales Manager, Licensed Estate Agent & Auctioneer
